glsa.title: Tinyproxy: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been found in Tinyproxy, allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Tinyproxy is a light-weight HTTP/HTTPS proxy daemon for POSIX operating systems.

description.p: A vulnerability has been discovered in the way how Tinyproxy works with headers.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted request with too many headers, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Tinyproxy users should upgrade to the latest version:
